title: Peloton Bikes, Viking or Frigidaire gas range and micro-hood
posting_body: Welcome to Equinox, our luxurious, pet-friendly apartments nestled in the heart of Eastlake, Seattle, WA.
Perfectly centered for both work and play, our waterfront community boasts an unbeatable location, mesmerizing views, fantastic amenities, and impeccable fixtures.
You won’t have to compromise on anything when you rent one of our spacious studio, one or two-bedroom apartments!
If it sounds too good to be true, think again: we’re less than ten minutes from Downtown Seattle, the Space Needle, the University District, a world-famous museum, swanky restaurants, and more.

Our stylish community features a state-of-the-art fitness center with ample workout equipment, a peaceful yoga studio, and an impressive rooftop terrace with unobstructed views of Lake Union and the city skyline.
And these are just a few of our highlights.
In our modern apartment building with condo grade construction, you’ll enjoy airy, open floor plans, individual balconies, and chef-inspired kitchens.
Floor-to-ceiling windows, cherry colored hardwood flooring, tile backsplashes, and granite countertops boost the deluxe feel of our units.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 831 Sq.
- Custom cabinetry in two different finishes
- Top-of-the-line Viking, Jenn Aire or Fisher & Paykel stainless steel refrigerators*
- Stylish ceramic tile surrounds in baths
- Chic cubbies to display your cookbooks or serving ware
- Advanced-technology Frigidaire front loading washer and dryer*
- Viking or Frigidaire gas range and micro-hood
- Polished slab granite kitchen and bathroom countertops
- Parking Garage with Full Size Spaces
- Reservable Yoga Studio with Fitness on Demand
Ask about our accepted breeds and weight limits.
We are located at 1524 Eastlake Ave E, Seattle, WA, 98102.
Equinox is conveniently located just minutes from downtown Seattle and located just a short distance to the I-5 ramp.
Take EXIT 167 on the LEFT toward AQUARIUM/SEATTLE CENTER.
AVE N. Turn LEFT onto EASTLAKE
Take the BOYLSTON AVE exit, EXIT 168A, toward ROANOKE ST.
Stay STRAIGHT to go onto BOYLSTON
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
